name: SlateCast
tag_list: film, movie, filmmaker, filmmaking, cast, talent, actor, film-enthusiasts, crew, social-network, software, online, independent-film
overview:
Online, location-centric collaboration platform for film industry professionals.

The idea behind SlateCast is strikingly simple â€“ helping to deliver the right information to the right people. However, nobody has attempted to do this on such a scale.

This is an amazing, fast growing and rapidly changing market, yet highly fragmented and decentralized. It is driven by very motivated, and passionate about what they do people.

SlateCast is here to help with some of the challenges along the way. As more of the features released the more opportunities arise. More rapid development will allow SlateCast to establish itself as a leading platform for filmmaking community.

milestones.description: Beta version of new tool for filmmakers that allows to storyboard online is released at http://www.slatecast.com/storyboard
milestones.source_description: Are Slatecastâ€™s Online Storyboard Tools Any Good?

milestones.description: High school filmmakers use SlateCast.com to cast their projects and learn the casting process.

Added new functionality for Talent profiles, that allows to see who viewed your profile recently and even how they found it. Did they google and what keywords they used or perhaps they clicked your link from some other site, like Facebook or MySpace.
